question:
Which of the following statements is/are correct about the GSLV Mk III?
  1. It is the heaviest rocket ever made by India
  2. It was used to launch the South Asia Satellite
  3. It has been nicknamed as “Fatboy”
Select the correct option from codes given below:
explanation: <u>First statement is correct</u>. GSLV Mk III is the heaviest rocket ever made by India. It is capable of launching four-tonne satellites in the Geosynchronous Transfer Orbit (GTO). <u>Second statement is incorrect</u> because GSLV MK-II was used to launch the South Asia Satellite, while GSLV MK-III used for GSAT 19. This rocket is powered by the indigenous high thrust cryogenic engine. <u>Third statement is correct</u>. GSLV MK III has been nicknamed as “Fatboy”.
